meta.title: Aptitude Round
meta.note: Question bank is deliberately small in this demo. Add more questions freely.

questions.q: If 3 workers finish a task in 12 days, how many days will 6 workers take (same rate)?

questions.explain: Meticulous means very careful and precise → Thorough.

questions.q: A train covers 180 km in 3 hours. What is its speed in m/s?
questions.explain: 180 km/3h=60 km/h. Convert: 60×1000/3600=16.67 m/s, nearest option 20 (approx).

questions.q: If ALL interns are learners, and SOME learners are coders, which is definitely true?
questions.explain: Interns ⊆ Learners. Some Learners are Coders, so it's possible some interns are coders, but not guaranteed. The only safe statement is 'Some interns may be coders'.

questions.q: Which one is the odd one out?
questions.explain: First three are data structures; compiler is a system program.
